storyInfo: Even in death, a Sea Terror still tries to observe the land. Everyone who witnesses it realizes that Gran Faro has fallen into a terrible crisis.

attributes.content: Miss Alty! Your 'Refactored Possession' was positively spectacular!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Really? Color me surprised. I thought that silly little idea I came up with in the jungles of Sargon was a bit too avant-garde.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: But turns out that doctor had someone like you under her wing? I thought you'd all be as stuffy as her.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Haha... So, where are the others?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Dan's the excitable type, so she ran straight to the beach. Aya and Frost went back to the hotel. Pretty run-down place, but kind of interesting.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Interesting? Really?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: So did Kal'tsit tell you anything about us?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: I only caught a word or two. Seems like you folks have something important on your hands?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I was blown away when I heard that the world-famous AUS had personal ties with Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: To be honest, I could say the same.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: But... Still, I'm glad to have fans even out here. Gives this trip some much-needed spice.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Finally getting to meet you makes that whole excruciating month all worth it, though. Ah, if it's not too much trouble, could you please sign this poster too?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Why'd you even bother coming back to Iberia?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: That's... rather complicated. And something I sure didn't expect Alty from Alive Until Sunset, of all people, to be asking me.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You like the name of our band?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Like? Nay, I absolutely adore it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Appreciate it.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: So where is she? I figured she'd be waiting here with that know-it-all look on her face, and then end up telling us nothing in a lot of words.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Still waiting for Dr. Kal'tsit to contact me. She shouldn't have arrived much later than you all.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hope she hurries up then... High tide is about to roll in.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: ...Outsiders. All outsiders. What happened all of a sudden? Did the Inquisition really loosen up its grip that much?
attributes.name: Male Townsperson

attributes.content: Yes, outsiders, all outsiders. They are very special. They carry the scent of the ocean.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Ægirs?
attributes.name: Male Townsperson

attributes.content: Possibly, possibly not. Our brothers and sisters are all afraid.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: We must make haste. Scarcely has the Inquisition been so negligent... It's too suspicious. Even if the laxity of these waters is a trap, we must continue our relentless pursuit.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: For the sake of our brothers and sisters, for the sake of restoring the Herald's connection to this land, we must first secure the Eye of Iberia... or destroy it!
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: I do not wish to indiscriminately slaughter the innocent. You were all my family, once.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Go, and have more people join us. We now have the option of choosing a profoundly vast road, greater than what Iberia promised us. Greater than this entire land.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Those people... Are the outsiders why our brothers have become restless?
attributes.name: Male Townsperson

attributes.content: It's highly likely, but I can't say for sure. We are all weak and frail. Our brothers are weak and frail. We cannot act rashly, or the Inquisition will exterminate us.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: We must be... careful. Or there will be too much blood spilled on this soil, and she does not like blood. Neither us nor our brothers and sisters need die in vain.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: ...! Who's there?!
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: I knew it. Cultists, of the Church of the Deep... I step out of Iberia for just a few years, and now their scent is everywhere.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Hmm... But I'm actually starting to look forward to seeing her for once. Is she still not here?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Yeah. Dr. Kal'tsit mentioned that the Inquisition will probably keep a close eye on her, so...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's weird. I'm sure she was there for the start of Iberia's Golden Age. She should at least be able to get an audience with their leaders. Why take such a lame approach?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Haha, very funny. Iberia's ascent was centuries ago. Even she can't be more than—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Seems her long years of experience have taught her how best to navigate this world... Alas, I'm too young and beautiful to get that stuff.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Haha, surely you jest, Miss Alty...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: So... if something really were to happen to her, would you help her?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Um... If you're willing to plead on her behalf, maybe.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Is she really that important to your, uh... Rhodes Island, was it?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: ...To be perfectly honest, I really don't understand why she would put herself at risk like this, just to come to Iberia.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But, I fully believe that she willingly took on this responsibility. And if even Dr. Kal'tsit is prepared to risk herself for Iberia, then as an Iberian, I have even less of an excuse.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Then you'd better go take a look. Or keep waiting here. Who knows, someone might just barge in here hollering and screaming?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Hey, what's that supposed to—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Out on the plaza! I just saw one—a monster! There's a monster out there! Huh? Is anyone here?!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: Wait right here, Miss Alty! I'm going to see what's going on!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...What a terrible odor.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: But, Dan was right. The petals in the sea of consciousness fall into a waterfall flowing in reverse. The melody of the scales, the ballad of the rootstalks... are all ready to come forth.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Maybe I'll find a few nuggets of inspiration on this trip after all.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: What... is that...?
attributes.name: Crowd of Onlookers

attributes.content: Old Pedri was right! My grandfather wrote about these in his diary! It's a Sea Monster!
attributes.name: Crowd of Onlookers

attributes.content: I-Is it... Is it dead? It won't start moving, right?
attributes.name: Crowd of Onlookers

attributes.content: Sorry, excuse me, coming through—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What little light remains filters through the clouds, partially cloven by the monolithic statue. The light's blood splashes across the ground, forming shadows.
A dying Sea Terror rests quietly in the monolith's shadow, like an old man leaning against a tree to find his final respite.
Is it... already dead?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Old Pedri wasn't lying! It really is a monster! A monster from the sea appeared in Gran Faro!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: I know what it's called! We've seen them before!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: (So this is a Sea Terror?)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (But the coastline is so calm... And how could the Inquisition miss something this blatant?)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Its vacant, lifeless eyes seem to still be spinning, the land a vast, waterless ocean before them.
But just as Elysium mistakes it for clinging to life, its gaze once again seems to fixate on a deep, profound death, and its motions halt completely.
(It's... staring at me? Or, at something else?)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Who's going to deal with the corpse?
attributes.name: Crowd of Onlookers

attributes.content: Just look it! How disgusting! Would it eat people if it were still alive?
attributes.name: Crowd of Onlookers

attributes.content: The Sea Terror cannot speak, but its deformed husk shines brightly.
A large group of people gather around it. Afraid. Suspicious. But nevertheless drawn to it, as if it were lit fireworks.
Fireworks, indeed. Its death is just like fireworks. No gashes, no signs of wounds from a handcannon.
Death did not choose it. Rather, it chose death.
...No, now I'm just rambling to myself.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If this is one of those Sea Terrors from the report, then the Church of the Deep must already be closer than we thought.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Miss Amaia! Hurry, come take a look at this thing—
attributes.name: Crowd of Onlookers

attributes.content: Now now, calm down...
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Could this really be... from the sea?
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: I can't hide the truth from you all. Indeed... this is a monster from the sea.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Th-Then, this has to be reported to the Inquisition right away! We need to call the Penal Battalion over to deal with these monsters— No, have the Inquisitors themselves come!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: Otherwise, we're all doomed!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: It seems everyone is running towards the chapel?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: What's going on? Hey, someone tell me what happened!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: Someone found the corpse of a monster out in the plaza!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: A monster...? The things Old Pedri was talking about?
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: That's right, everyone's clamoring to pick a Messenger to go fetch the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: Do you know what it looks like? I heard it had fangs a meter long, and eight pairs of eyes— Hey, where are you going, Thiago?!
attributes.name: Panicking Townsperson

attributes.content: Head back and wait for me, Jordi. Don't set foot outside, no matter what!
attributes.name: Thiago

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Okay, got it...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: We'd better not get mixed up in all this chaos. Who knows what kind of vile diseases these monsters might be carrying.
attributes.name: Cautious Townsperson

attributes.content: A monster...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: What in the world is going on?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Damn you, Ægir! Accursed Ægir! He actually went and slaughtered one of our kin!
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Ugh, my wound...
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Jordi?
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: You know me? Who are you?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I... You don't need to know, nor do you know me. But I know you, if only because you are an Ægir.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Y-You're hurt!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Yes, and will you bandage me up? Aren't you the chapel's caregiver?
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: I can help you, but you have to tell me how this happened.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: ...Very well.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Take a seat.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Just bear with it.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Nngh...
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Stop moving! Luckily, you don't have any broken bones or ruptured organs... Is this a laceration wound? There's even sawdust stuck beneath the skin. How did this happen?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: An Ægir killed my kin. I was involved, but managed to escape.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: M-Murder?! In a small town like this? You'll have to bring this up with Uncle Thiago right away—
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Hah... Haha. Mayor Thiago can't control the Ægir. How ironic. Only the Inquisition can punish him now.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: B-But, he killed someone in your family.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: We are always being hunted. Out of ignorance, fear, anger... the latter lingering from that disaster. Thank you, I already feel much better.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Wait, are you... Mr. Juan?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: So you still remember my face, Jordi. Have you ever wanted... to gaze into the sea?
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Gaze... into the sea? Uncle Thiago has taken me to the coast before, but...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.text: The sea was dark. The wind tugged at his hair, and the waves roared.
The meaning of a 'hometown' varies from person to person. It might be the aroma of wheat, the angle of the shadow cast across an alley, or the sound of wheels rolling over mud and snow.
But at that moment, Jordi knew that his life in Gran Faro had already been paid for in advance, with his hometown.

attributes.content: The land has already forgotten the ocean's true form, but sooner or later we shall all return to the sea.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: (Broken Ægirian) Thank you, Jordi. Thank you for your kindness. May infinite altruism fill the void of existence one day.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: (Broken Ægirian) If you are still Ægir, Jordi, then leave us be. Turn back and return to your life. It is better that way.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: (Broken Ægirian) Perhaps you too, like your parents before you, will go in search of that lighthouse.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: Wh-What did you say? I didn't catch that!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: (Broken Ægirian) My kindred refugees have come for me. But do not worry. Gran Faro has always been a stepping stone. Our destination is the deep sea.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: (Soft slithering sound)
attributes.name: Creeping Sea Terror

attributes.content: Jordi, Jordi. Ægir.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent

attributes.content: We shall meet again.
attributes.name: Strange Adherent
